p: Bovine papillomavirus type in the genus Dyokappa papillomavirus ( Bauermann et al., 2017), bovine beta-retrovirus termed BoRV-CH15 ( WÃ¼thrich et al., 2016), have been identified in bovines. On Illumina MiSeq, a novel bovine polyomavirus species (BPyV2-SF) was detected along with other known viruses, in store purchased beef from stores in San Francisco ( Zhang et al., 2014a,b). In Holstein bull calf, Aichivirus B, was tentatively identified in cerebrospinal fluid by next generation DNA sequencing ( Moreira et al., 2017), only after its initial misdiagnosis for infection with RV and Cryptosporidium.
